name: Vidyard
headline: Video for business.
description:
Vidyard is The Video Platform for Marketing, Sales & Secure Communications. 

Vidyard is the easiest way to create, host, and share videos so businesses can keep connected with customers and colleagues.

Want to learn more? Visit our website, and check out our 6-minute demo: http://ow.ly/q7hz30jMDd6

founders.description:

## The key to every top performer’s success
No customer wants to feel like a number. With Vidyard, your reps can **make every conversation count** with personalized video messages that build rapport right out of the gate. Whether you’re sending a single video message or scaling your reach with Video Sales Agent, you can be confident you’re delivering an authentic, personalized experience at every touchpoint.
Video Sales Agent
## Scale the sales activities that win deals with AI-powered video
  * Equip every rep with an AI Avatar that automatically engages buyers with the right message at the right time.
  * Automate tedious sales workflows so reps can focus on high-value conversations.
  * Turn every rep into a top performer by easily replicating the messages that are resonating with customers.


[Learn More](http://vidyard.com/</products/ai-avatars/>)
![Woman creating AI video with her Linkedin](http://vidyard.com/wp-content/themes/vidyard-website/img/templated-pages/front-page/ai.webp)
Video Messages
## Build better customer relationships
  * Send personalized video messages that break through busy inboxes.
  * Get detailed insight into video performance and viewer engagement.
  * Maintain consistent messaging and compliance standards across every sales conversation.


[Learn More](http://vidyard.com/</products/vidyard-video-messages/>)

Video Hosting
## Easily host and manage all your videos
  * Upload, publish, track, and organize all your team’s video content in one place.
  * Get real-time insights into who’s watching your content and what messages are resonating with video engagement analytics.
  * Leverage video engagement analytics as triggers for Video Sales Agent to automatically create and send personalized videos.


[Learn More](http://vidyard.com/</products/vidyard-hosting/>)

**Vidyard: Revolutionizing Video Communication for Businesses**

Founded in 2011 and a proud member of the Y Combinator S11 batch, Vidyard has made quite a name for itself in the realm of business communication. Hailing from Kitchener, Canada, their mission is simple yet profound: to integrate video into the business world. Their platform is designed to effortlessly create, host, and share videos, facilitating seamless communication between companies and their customers or colleagues.

### What They Do

Vidyard transforms how teams communicate through innovative video solutions. At its core, Vidyard was conceived as a marketing and sales tool but has evolved into a versatile platform for secure communications. Companies can harness the power of personalized video messages, which have proven to enhance engagement, improve response rates, and ultimately drive more sales.

Some of their standout offerings include:
- **Vidyard Video Messages**: Crafting personalized video content to stand out in crowded inboxes.
- **Vidyard Hosting**: A centralized space for managing all video content.
- **Vidyard Prospector**: A robust tool for AI-driven sales outreach, allowing businesses to automate and scale their sales efforts.
- **AI Avatars**: This feature generates personalized video content at scale, leveraging artificial intelligence to enhance customer interactions.

### Size and Structure

With a dedicated team of around 201 employees, Vidyard operates from the innovation hub of Kitchener. They’ve partnered with renowned names in the industry and offer a range of integrations with platforms like Salesforce, LinkedIn, and Gong, making it easier than ever for sales teams to incorporate video into their workflows.

### The Impact

The company has provided remarkable case studies, demonstrating that personalized video messages can lead to an 8x improvement in click-through rates and a 4x improvement in reply rates. This speaks volumes about the potential of video communication in today's digital landscape.

### Get Involved

If you're eager to see Vidyard in action, they offer live demos that let you explore the platform guided by an expert. For businesses looking to enhance their communication strategy and drive results, Vidyard creates a compelling case for integrating video into their sales and marketing approaches.

For more in-depth information, you can visit their website at [Vidyard.com](http://vidyard.com) and check out their [6-minute demo](http://ow.ly/q7hz30jMDd6). Whether you're a startup or an established enterprise, Vidyard's solutions can help you engage better with your audience and close more deals.
